rows.label: tlk43300241_06_msg0002
rows.name:
I don't know what to do!
Now I can't finish my painting!

rows.label: tlk43300241_06_msg0004
rows.name:
I am but a humble painter,
but I received a decidedly
extravagant request!

rows.label: tlk43300241_06_msg0005
rows.name:
They want me to paint a new portrait
of Queen Lagert each month!

rows.label: tlk43300241_06_msg0006
rows.name:
Now, this was my first time, so
obviously I wanted to put my
best foot forward, but...

rows.label: tlk43300241_06_msg0007
rows.name: I've run out of pigment for the painting!

rows.label: tlk43300241_06_msg0008
rows.name:
In putting my best foot forward,
I must've laid the paint on too thick.

rows.label: tlk43300241_06_msg0009
rows.name:
And now I don't even have enough
Tricolor Rock left to make more...

rows.label: tlk43300241_06_msg0010
rows.name:
If I don't come up with something
quick, I'm going to blow the deadline!

rows.label: tlk43300241_06_msg0011
rows.name: Oh! I thank you for your kind words!
